parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name>gr2 </name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets given music track event handler. Will overwrite other music event handlers. Use [[addMusicEventHandler]] if you want to stack them.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setMusicEventHandler''' [type, function]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [type, function]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - "MusicStart" or "MusicStop"

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> function: [[String]] - script to be executed. Passes params array 0: class name of the sound in [[Description.ext#Music|CfgMusic]], 1: event handler id

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - id of the event handler

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ehID = [[setMusicEventHandler]] ["MusicStart", "[[hint]] [[str]] _this"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ehID = [[setMusicEventHandler]] ["MusicStop", "[[hint]] [[str]] _this"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMusicEventHandler]], [[removeMusicEventHandler]], [[playMusic]], [[removeAllMusicEventHandlers]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
